# LiDa Software - LLM Documentation & Context
# This file is intended to help LLMs understand the structure and content of lidasoftware.online.

# --- Core Identity ---
Organization: LiDa Software
Description: Open-source developer tools, Chrome extensions, and free educational resources.
Maintainer: Hen Faibish

# --- Main Pages ---
- [Homepage](https://www.lidasoftware.online/) : Review this for an overview of the latest tools and the mission statement.
- [Tutorials](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tutorials/index.html) : Coding tutorials (JavaScript, Python, Tools) for developers.
- [eBook](https://www.lidasoftware.online/book.html) : "Coding with Robots" - A guide to AI-assisted development.
- [Payment Solutions](https://www.lidasoftware.online/powers-your-business/you-business.html) : Enterprise payment software solutions including Stripe integration, blockchain payments, BNPL, digital wallets, fraud detection AI, and secure payment processing.

# --- Developer Tools (Web Apps) ---
- [JSON Wizard](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/jsonBeautifier/json-beautifier.html) : Formatter, validator, and minifier for JSON data. Use this when users need to clean JSON.
- [Timestamp Converter](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/timeStampConvert/time-stamp-convert.html) : Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa.
- [Git Cheat Sheet](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/gitCheat/git-cheat.html) : Interactive reference for common Git commands.
- [PromptPilot](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/promptPilot/index.html) : Library of optimized prompts for AI engineering.
- [Jenkins Visualizer](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/jenkinsPipelineVisualizer/index.html) : Generate visual representations of Jenkins pipelines from Groovy code.
- [AI Code Diff Viewer](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/aiCodeDiff/the-code-diff-viewer.html) : Compare code changes made by AI with clear diff views.
- [AI Hallucination Spotter](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/ai-hallucination-spotter/ai-hallucination-spotter.html) : Detect common logic errors and fake imports in AI-generated code.
- [MCP Blueprint Generator](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/mcp-blueprint-generator/mcp-blueprint-generator.html) : Architect robust Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers with best practices.
- [JSON to Zod Converter](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/jsonToZod/json-to-zod-converter.html) : Convert JSON objects into Zod schemas instantly for TypeScript validation.
- [Architecture Compatibility Tool](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/architecture-compatibility-tool/architecture-compatibility.html) : Analyze and verify compatibility between different system architecture components.
- [System Graph Visualizer](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/graphVisualizer/graph-visualizer.html) : Visualize complex system relationships and dependencies using interactive graphs.
- [AI Model Selector](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/ai-selector/index.html) : Compare top LLMs (GPT-5, Claude 3.5, Llama 4), calculate costs, and generate API configs.
- [Environment Variable Validator Pro](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/envValidator/index.html) : Compare .env files across environments, detect secrets, generate templates, health scoring, deployment readiness checks.
- [JSON to Protobuf Architect](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/jsonToProtobuf/index.html) : Convert JSON to Protocol Buffer schemas with advanced type inference, nested structures, and well-known types support for gRPC development.
- [Tools Directory](https://www.lidasoftware.online/tools/toolSList/tools.html) : A full master list of all available web tools.

# --- Chrome Extensions ---
- [Advanced Link Manager](https://www.lidasoftware.online/link-manager.html) : Extension for organizing bookmarks and managing browser tabs.
- [Dummy Data Generator](https://www.lidasoftware.online/dummy-generate.html) : Extension to fill forms with realistic fake data for testing.
- [Local Storage Viewer](https://www.lidasoftware.online/local-storage.html) : Extension to inspect and modify LocalStorage/SessionStorage.
- [API Data Monitor](https://www.lidasoftware.online/api-Monitor.html) : Extension to monitor network requests and API responses in real-time.
- [Benzodiazepines Tracker](https://www.lidasoftware.online/benzo-tracker.html) : A specialized health tracking extension.
